quoteText: You agree not to use any automated tool, such as a web scraping tool, a bot or web robot, or web automation, to mine the Brainly Services or any products, services, information, or other materials available on, through or in connection with the Brainly Services or your Brainly Subscription, including, but not limited to, the Mobile Software, for information or to fill out forms on the Brainly Services, that you will not circumvent any technical measures implemented to prevent or limit such access, and that you will comply with the restrictions in any robot exclusion header.
title: Users cannot scrape the website of the service

tosdr.case: Users cannot scrape the website of the service
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use (in Part A, applicable to users unless you are in Europe) state that, "You agree not to use any automated tool, such as a web scraping tool, a bot or web robot, or web automation, to mine the Brainly Services or any products, services, information, or other materials available on, through or in connection with the Brainly Services or your Brainly Subscription, including, but not limited to, the Mobile Software, for information or to fill out forms on the Brainly Services, that you will not circumvent any technical measures implemented to prevent or limit such access, and that you will comply with the restrictions in any robot exclusion header."
